item.title: On the Ethics of the Subjective Theory of Value
item.description: A guy who barely passed AP Econ in high school muses about the ethical rationales of modern economic theory and capitalism.

item.title: The Bill of Temporary Privileges
item.description: Are rights are an illusion? An ignoramus expresses his thoughts.
